description: I am a software developer passionate about creating efficient and scalable solutions. I enjoy working with modern technologies, continuously learning, and delivering value through code.

cv.phrase: Download my PDF CV to learn more about me

tasks: Handling relational databases to query records, geometries, and forms.
Integration of third-party services and APIs into applications (React, JavaScript).
Build and maintain server logic and functionality using Python.
Create and maintain reusable front-end components in VueJS.
Collaborated with designers, developers, and teams to ensure successful implementation.
Participated in meetings to discuss requirements, technical issues, and best practices.
Designed and developed responsive front-end applications with React.
Built and maintained scalable back-end services and APIs with relational & NoSQL databases.
Worked in a Microsoft environment: C#, APIs, WebApps, Webhooks.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software.
Implemented best practices in Git, testing, CI/CD pipelines for system reliability.

codedoc.name: CodeDocViewer
codedoc.desc: Web application with frontend in React and backend in Django REST Framework, integrated with ANTLR. It processes Python 3 source files to document and generate flow diagrams, as well as Django REST Framework data models to create class diagrams.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Shopify
ecommerce.desc: E-commerce platform developed in Shopify with theme customization and optimized shopping experience. Integrated payment gateways and inventory management.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Colombia National University — Systems and Computing Engineering
